DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , randomize , placebo-controlled , single blind , parallel group , single-center study design evaluate immune response administration 12 weekly SC dose 1.0 mg/kg efalizumab subject moderate plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Efalizumab Immune Responses Subjects With Moderate Plaque Psoriasis
